cache_inode_status_t cache_inode_rename (  cache_entry_t *  pentry_dirsrc,
fsal_name_t *  poldname,

fsal_name_t *  pnewname,

hash_table_t *  ht,
cache_inode_client_t *  pclient,
fsal_op_context_t *  pcontext,
cache_inode_status_t *  pstatus
) 
 

cache_inode_rename: renames an entry in the cache.

Renames an entry in the cache. This operation is used for moving an object into a different directory.

Parameters:
pentry_dirsrc [IN] entry pointer for the source directory
newname [IN] name of the object in the source directory
pentry_dirdest [INOUT] entry pointer for the destination directory in which the object will be moved.
newname [IN] name of the object in the destination directory
pattr_src [OUT] contains the source directory attributes if not NULL
pattr_dst [OUT] contains the destination directory attributes if not NULL
ht [INOUT] hash table used for the cache.
pclient [INOUT] ressource allocated by the client for the nfs management.
pcontext [IN] FSAL credentials
pstatus [OUT] returned status.
Returns:
CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS operation is a success

CACHE_INODE_LRU_ERROR allocation error occured when validating the entry

CACHE_INODE_NOT_FOUND source object does not exist

cache_inode_status_t cache_inode_rename_cached_dirent (  cache_entry_t *  pentry_parent,
fsal_name_t *  oldname,
fsal_name_t *  newname,
hash_table_t *  ht,
cache_inode_client_t *  pclient,
cache_inode_status_t *  pstatus
) 
 

cache_inode_rename_cached_dirent: renames an entry in the same directory.

Renames an entry in the same directory.

Parameters:
pentry_parent [INOUT] cache entry representing the directory to be managed.
oldname [IN] name of the entry to rename.
newname [IN] new name for the entry
ht [IN] hash table used for the cache, unused in this call.
pclient [INOUT] ressource allocated by the client for the nfs management.
pstatus [OUT] returned status.
Returns:
the same as *pstatus
